members.name: accentButtonText
members.descriptionHtml: Color of text for accent button (kicker)

members.name: actionLink
members.descriptionHtml: Neutral colored links and links for action buttons.

members.name: actionLinkHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Hover state for neutral colored links and links for action buttons.

members.name: bodySubtext
members.descriptionHtml: De-emphasized text; e.g. metadata, captions, placeholder text.

members.name: bodyText
members.descriptionHtml: The default color for text.

members.name: bodyTextChecked
members.descriptionHtml: Checked text color, e.g. selected menu item text.

members.name: buttonText
members.descriptionHtml: Color of text in a standard button

members.name: buttonTextChecked
members.descriptionHtml: Color of text in a checked standard button

members.name: buttonTextCheckedHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Color of text in a checked and hovered standard button

members.name: buttonTextDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Color of text in a disabled standard button

members.name: buttonTextHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Color of text in a hovered standard button

members.name: buttonTextPressed
members.descriptionHtml: Color of text in a pressed standard button; i.e. currently being clicked by mouse

members.name: disabledBodySubtext
members.descriptionHtml: Disabled de-emphasized text, for use on the default background (bodyBackground).

members.name: disabledBodyText
members.descriptionHtml: The default color for disabled text on the default background (bodyBackground).

members.name: disabledSubtext
members.descriptionHtml: Disabled de-emphasized text, for use on disabledBackground.

members.name: disabledText
members.descriptionHtml: The default color for disabled text on top of disabledBackground; e.g. text in a disabled text field, disabled button text.

members.name: errorText
members.descriptionHtml: The default color of error text, used on bodyBackground.

members.name: inputPlaceholderText
members.descriptionHtml: The color of placeholder text.

members.name: inputText
members.descriptionHtml: The color of input text.

members.name: inputTextHovered
members.descriptionHtml: The color of input text on hover.

members.name: link
members.descriptionHtml: The color of a link.

members.name: linkHovered
members.descriptionHtml: The color of a hovered link. Also used when the link is active.

members.name: listText
members.descriptionHtml: The default text color for list item titles and text in column fields.

members.name: primaryButtonText
members.descriptionHtml: Color of text in a primary button

members.name: primaryButtonTextDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Color of text in a disabled primary button

members.name: primaryButtonTextHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Color of text in a hovered primary button

members.name: primaryButtonTextPressed
members.descriptionHtml: Color of text in a pressed primary button; i.e. currently being clicked by mouse

members.name: warningText
members.descriptionHtml: The color of text on errorBackground, warningBackground, blockingBackground, or successBackground.
